about_the_game:
Step into the role of THORYN, an elite soldier, and embark on a mission to uncover what the brilliant scientist DR. ZYPHAR is hiding from you.

He is responsible for the research on the ZOPHARION virus.

The research station is plunged into chaos when experiments spiral out of control, and the ZOPHARION virus transforms crew members into monsters.

No one is safe, and the virus spreads at a terrifying rate.

Forced to face both these creatures and your own fears, you must make difficult decisions that will determine the fate of the station and humanity.

Two brothers introduce a new level of fear with the science-fiction horror Zopharion.

Using top-tier equipment, they focus on every detail, from realistic animations to an immersive storyline, creating an experience that redefines the boundaries of horror.

Planet Earth has become an inhospitable place, and humanity has lost all hope of survival.

The Zopharion virus, previously unknown to the world, was created by the corporation ‘CUBE’ and spread globally, triggering an apocalypse that has brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

In a desperate rescue attempt, CUBE sends a research team to an unknown planet, tasked with developing an antidote for the virus.

However, the truth about CUBE’s intentions and the tragedy that will unfold on the alien planet is far darker than anyone could have imagined.

Key Features of the Game:

🔹 Exploration & Investigation: Explore the infected research station, solve puzzles, and gather clues to uncover CUBE’s dark secrets and learn the truth about the virus.

🔹 Dynamic Action & Survival: Face off against mutants and terrifying anomalies within the station. Every choice you make may impact your survival.

🔹 Moral Dilemmas: Decide how to act in crucial moments – will you trust those who seem to be hiding dark secrets, or take drastic measures to save what little hope remains for humanity?
Your choices will shape the course of events, determining not only the fate of the crew but also the ultimate outcome of this terrifying mission. Every decision may have unexpected consequences, and the truth you uncover could be far darker than you ever anticipated.

🔹 Tension & Atmosphere: The game blends intense action with deep, emotional storytelling, where uncertainty and fear accompany you at every turn.

🔹 Interactive Endings: Your decisions will not only determine Thoryn’s fate but also the future of the entire planet and the ultimate resolution of the crisis.
Prepare for a game that forces you to confront your deepest fears, the mysteries of the past, and the horrifying reality of the future.
Zopharion is a survival horror game that tests not only your ability to endure but also your morality.
Will you be able to stop the virus from spreading before it’s too late?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Wymaga 64-bitowego procesora i systemu operacyjnego
  • Processor: Windows 10/11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060, Radeon RX 5600 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Wymaga 64-bitowego procesora i systemu operacyjnego
  • Processor: Intel i7-6800K, AMD Ryzen 5 PRO 1600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 3070, Radeon RX 6800 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: Will you risk everything to stop the Zopharion virus? Will the truth you discover prove too frightening? Explore a hostile world, face unknown threats, uncover secrets, solve puzzles and fight to save the research station from a pandemic.
